title: Can people stop WANTING Quinn to be bad?
body:
I just had a game with a Braum Support as Quinn ad, and my supporter literally judged that "my champion was bad" so the lane wasn't worth defending and abandoned me to afk farm the entire game, I got ganked three times, three v one, made it out once. Everyone wonders where I am because I'm trying to split push and make up for all that lost gold. 

Seriously, No team would do that to their ADC Vayne: leave her alone all game and then complain why She hasn't grouped up.

replies.body:
Quinn has been on the edge of viability since fucking launch, and the only reason she doesn't see play is that _Riot refuses to fix her janky-ass autos and Harrier mechanic._

She has burst for days. She has an AoE skillshot blind. She has her crazy birdmode execute. Her teamfight mechanics aren't great (she doesn't have Sivir's utility, Graves' tankiness, or Lucian's raw mobility to make up for her low range) but when played right, the enemy team is forced to group at all times or suffer the consequences.

Unfortunately, the sound-effect for her Harrier-modified autoattack seems to play like 5 frames before the attack actually goes off, making it almost impossible to stutter-step with her. The fact that Harrier needs to MODIFY the autoattack (as opposed to being a consumable mark, for example) is bullshit too, and that's not even getting into the shitty RNG minigame it forces. Last time I saw a Quinn, we almost got a level 1 kill on her because Valor marked one of us out of nowhere, revealing her in the bush.

Quinn isn't underpowered. _She is severely gimped by bugs._
{{champion:72}}: "Quinn has been temporarily disabled by a bug."

They just need to fix that autoattack animation. It's really slow, and it makes it really hard to kite. Sometimes the auto attack doesn't proc even after shooting it since she moved right afterwards. It seems like the Harrier modified autoattack animation is a lot more longer than a normal autoattack animation, and even that auto attack animation is slower than most adc's  animations. The bugs aren't game breaking, but it definitely affects her ability to shine by a lot.

She doesnt have the teamfight mechanics, but she does have the personal utility to help herself survive throughout a fight (and sometimes the whole team, I mean who doesn't want TARGETED HARD CC)

And like the above, she definitely has her own niche in the marksmen category, and can shine, but is limited by the bugs, which for some reason, still exists.

As a Quinn fan myself. I have to say she's at the bottom of the barrel when it comes to ADC's. 

As an ADC her best part of the game is early game. Her level 2 is powerful. 

But that's about it. And her early game is only good IF you can play aggressively. Her poke and range is not that great. She needs to land her Q and E's. 

In this lane you faced an Alistar. You using your E is asking for him to combo you. if he does it right you will be CC'ed right in front of your enemy and Bruam will have to leap to you to save you. Putting both of you in danger. 

You also faced a Graves. An ADC who likes to use his abilities to kill you as much as his basic attacks. He doesn't have to care about your blind. He can also be tanky. Which is a hard thing for early aggressive champions to deal with. 

So you probably didn't do well early game. You were countered, or countered yourself by picking Quinn after them. 

Quinn is a champion who is very reliant on her basic attacks. Her abilities base damages and scaling are not very impressive. This means she is very item dependent. She has to use her strong early game get ahead and stay ahead. if she does not do this she will be weak in the mid game. And she's always weak late game unless she's super fed. 

- Has to have a strong early game. This has to be done by playing aggressively. This is hard to do in a duo lane where someone else can take advantage of her weaknesses. 
- If early game does not go well she will do poorly for the rest of the game 99% of the time. ADC's cannot be dead weight. Graves is an early game ADC and will still out scale past laning phase. Only thing you have over him is a blind and mobility on your ult. 
- Her abilities as an ADC are weak. Her E puts her in harms way. Her R is a clean up/escape tool. Not something you look to your ADC for unless it's Jinx. Generally she'll face champions who kill with abilities more than AA's so her Q isn't impressive either. W is nice utility and a great steroid, but isn't reliable at all. You can't 100% control her passive and using E is risky. 



It's not about Quinn being bad. It's about knowing when to use her. She is very situational and requires getting ahead to work. This is hardest to do in a duo lane. On top of her other drawbacks as an ADC. You ultimately picked a bad lane on top of being counterpicked

A lot of this wouldn't be so bad if her bugs didn't exist and weren't so common. But her kit as a whole even without bugs is bad for an ADC.

I think shes a terrible adc (coming from a plat, 5 year bot lane main) due to many reasons. Really low range, an ult made for diving and clean up, poor spacing with her e, etc... BUT i play her mid assassin all the time, and i think shes great at it. she has amazing trade potential, she counters alot of assassins mid, her burst is pretty insane, and her ability to roam is almost unmatched with her movement speed in her ult. shes also great at avoiding ganks and makes vision battles mid lane and river way easier with her w. still i think she could stand to improve.

ways to improve: Her power during he ult is actually a bit hindered by the fact that she cant use her passive in it as well as the fact that her passive can be really unreliable with the target it chooses. i feel if she could use her passive in her ult as well as have valor mark the last clicked enemy and increase her passives range she could be way better. Her auto range could stand to improve as well but not by to much, and maybe fiddle with her e a bit. 

overall i think shes a way better mid laner than she is an adc, but unfortunately people forgot about her so quickly that she isnt even being played at all. and we all know how most people are. dont want to try things that might not work so they instead wait for others to do it for them 

tl;rd Quinn can mid way better than adc
